Text: for me the sound of the music is what is important .  the zen xtra sounds great with good headphone and well recored mp3s .  navigation is a bit tricky and takes getting used to but the included pdf instructions cover the operation pretty well .  at 8 ounces it is pretty light but not as light as the ipod .  the battery is replaceable ( a real plus ) and there is a leather case ( another real plus ) .  i suppose that you could jog with it but it seems to be made for the enjoyment of music .  so far the software for the pc works easily .  by the way , it looks nice also .
